speaker: RICHMOND
text:
God
               
              and
               
              your
               
              arms
               
              be
               
              praised
              ,
               
              victorious
               
              friends
              !

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
The
               
              day
               
              is
               
              ours
              ;
               
              the
               
              bloody
               
              dog
               
              is
               
              dead
              .

speaker: STANLEY
text:
Courageous
               
              Richmond
              ,
               
              well
               
              hast
               
              thou
               
              acquit
               
              thee
              .

speaker: STANLEY
text:
Lo
              ,
               
              here
               
              this
               
              long-usurpèd
               
              royalty

speaker: STANLEY
text:
From
               
              the
               
              dead
               
              temples
               
              of
               
              this
               
              bloody
               
              wretch

speaker: STANLEY
text:
Have
               
              I
               
              plucked
               
              off
              ,
               
              to
               
              grace
               
              thy
               
              brows
               
              withal
              .

speaker: STANLEY
text:
Wear
               
              it
              ,
               
              enjoy
               
              it
              ,
               
              and
               
              make
               
              much
               
              of
               
              it
              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
Great
               
              God
               
              of
               
              heaven
              ,
               
              say
               
              amen
               
              to
               
              all
              !

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
But
               
              tell
               
              me
              ,
               
              is
               
              young
               
              George
               
              Stanley
               
              living
              ?

speaker: STANLEY
text:
He
               
              is
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ,
               
              and
               
              safe
               
              in
               
              Leicester
               
              town
              ,

speaker: STANLEY
text:
Whither
              ,
               
              if
               
              it
               
              please
               
              you
              ,
               
              we
               
              may
               
              now
               
              withdraw
               
              us
              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
What
               
              men
               
              of
               
              name
               
              are
               
              slain
               
              on
               
              either
               
              side
              ?

speaker: STANLEY
text:
John
              ,
               
              Duke
               
              of
               
              Norfolk
              ,
               
              Walter
              ,
               
              Lord
               
              Ferrers
              ,

speaker: STANLEY
text:
Sir
               
              Robert
               
              Brakenbury
              ,
               
              and
               
              Sir
               
              William
               
              Brandon
              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
Inter
               
              their
               
              bodies
               
              as
               
              becomes
               
              their
               
              births
              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
Proclaim
               
              a
               
              pardon
               
              to
               
              the
               
              soldiers
               
              fled

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
That
               
              in
               
              submission
               
              will
               
              return
               
              to
               
              us
              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
And
               
              then
              ,
               
              as
               
              we
               
              have
               
              ta’en
               
              the
               
              sacrament
              ,

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
We
               
              will
               
              unite
               
              the
               
              white
               
              rose
               
              and
               
              the
               
              red
              ;

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
Smile
               
              heaven
               
              upon
               
              this
               
              fair
               
              conjunction
              ,

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
That
               
              long
               
              have
               
              frowned
               
              upon
               
              their
               
              enmity
              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
What
               
              traitor
               
              hears
               
              me
               
              and
               
              says
               
              not
               
              “
              Amen
              ”
              ?

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
England
               
              hath
               
              long
               
              been
               
              mad
               
              and
               
              scarred
               
              herself
              :

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
The
               
              brother
               
              blindly
               
              shed
               
              the
               
              brother’s
               
              blood
              ;

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
The
               
              father
               
              rashly
               
              slaughtered
               
              his
               
              own
               
              son
              ;

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
The
               
              son
              ,
               
              compelled
              ,
               
              been
               
              butcher
               
              to
               
              the
               
              sire
              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
All
               
              this
               
              divided
               
              York
               
              and
               
              Lancaster
              ,

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
Divided
               
              in
               
              their
               
              dire
               
              division
              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
O
              ,
               
              now
               
              let
               
              Richmond
               
              and
               
              Elizabeth
              ,

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
The
               
              true
               
              succeeders
               
              of
               
              each

              house
              ,

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
By
               
              God’s
               
              fair
               
              ordinance

              together
              ,

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
And
               
              let
               
              their
               
              heirs
              ,
               
              God
              ,
               
              if
               
              Thy
               
              will
               
              be
               
              so
              ,

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
Enrich
               
              the

              to
               
              come
               
              with
               
              smooth-faced
               
              peace
              ,

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
With
               
              smiling
               
              plenty

              days
              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
Abate
               
              the
               
              edge
               
              of
               
              traitors
              ,
               
              gracious
               
              Lord
              ,

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
That
               
              would
               
              reduce
               
              these
               
              bloody
               
              days
               
              again

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
And
               
              make
               
              poor
               
              England
               
              weep
               
              in
               
              streams
               
              of
               
              blood
              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
Let
               
              them
               
              not
               
              live
               
              to
               
              taste
               
              this
               
              land’s
               
              increase
              ,

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
That
               
              would
               
              with
               
              treason
               
              wound
               
              this
               
              fair
               
              land’s
               
              peace
              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
Now
               
              civil
               
              wounds
               
              are

              ,

              .

speaker: RICHMOND
text:
That
